<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Must both be in the same registers, or both in memory at the same offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Loc1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a07dddcff2886a2b840f993f7ce17dd28">isRegLoc</a>() &amp;&amp; Loc2.isRegLoc())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Loc1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a17dbc2feaea84ef8d353095d6e618f29">getLocReg</a>() == Loc2.getLocReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Loc1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a5bb903a1b21cafe8f73ce95ed629882e">isMemLoc</a>() &amp;&amp; Loc2.isMemLoc())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Loc1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#aa531ef30c8af299cbbd1a6660b3cf225">getLocMemOffset</a>() == Loc2.getLocMemOffset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unknown location kind&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::equal(RVLocs1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>(), RVLocs1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>(), RVLocs2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    RVLocs2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>(), AreCompatible);</span></CodeLine>
